Header: Strong rainstorm causes section of highway to collapse
Content: Repair efforts are still going on the collapsed section of State Highway 109 near the city of Qingtongxia, northwest Chinaâ€™s Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region. A strong rainstorm pommeled the region, dumping a maximum rain of 127.5 millimeters. The flash flood submerged croplands before it caused a section of the road to collapse. The collapsed part measured about 15 meters long and vehicles had to be diverted to State Highway 344, 30 kilometers to 40 kilometers away. At present, half of the road is negotiable and repair work on the other half is still going on.
